plugins.name: pslist
plugins.description: Lists the processes present in a memory dump.

plugins.name: pstree
plugins.description: Shows the parent-child relationship between processes in a tree view.

plugins.name: psxview
plugins.description: Helps detect hidden processes by cross-referencing various process listings.

plugins.name: psscan
plugins.description: Scans physical memory for EPROCESS objects.

plugins.name: cmdline
plugins.description: Displays process command-line arguments.

plugins.name: getsids
plugins.description: Print the SIDs owning each process.

plugins.name: dlllist
plugins.description: Lists the loaded DLLs for each process.

plugins.name: handles
plugins.description: Lists the open handles for each process.

plugins.name: netscan
plugins.description: Scans for network artifacts in Windows memory dumps.

plugins.name: netstat
plugins.description: Prints a list of open sockets and network connections.

plugins.name: connscan
plugins.description: Scans for connection objects using pool tag scanning.

plugins.name: sockets
plugins.description: Prints a list of open sockets.

plugins.name: sockscan
plugins.description: Scans for socket objects using pool tag scanning.

plugins.name: connections
plugins.description: Prints a list of open connections.

plugins.name: dnsquery
plugins.description: Prints DNS queries performed by processes.

plugins.name: filescan
plugins.description: Scans for file objects using pool tag scanning.

plugins.name: dumpfiles
plugins.description: Extracts memory mapped and cached files.

plugins.name: mftparser
plugins.description: Parses the Master File Table (MFT) from an NTFS volume.

plugins.name: shellbags
plugins.description: Prints ShellBags info.

plugins.name: shimcache
plugins.description: Parses the Application Compatibility Shim Cache registry key.

plugins.name: mutantscan
plugins.description: Scans for mutant objects (file-backed shared memory).

plugins.name: filesscan
plugins.description: Scans for FILE_OBJECT objects in memory.

plugins.name: hivelist
plugins.description: Lists the registry hives present in a memory dump.

plugins.name: hivescan
plugins.description: Scans for registry hives in a memory dump.

plugins.name: printkey
plugins.description: Prints a registry key, and its subkeys and values.

plugins.name: userassist
plugins.description: Prints the UserAssist registry keys and information.

plugins.name: hashdump
plugins.description: Dumps user hashes from the SAM registry hive.

plugins.name: lsadump
plugins.description: Dumps LSA secrets from the registry.

plugins.name: dumpregistry
plugins.description: Dumps registry hives to disk.

plugins.name: malfind
plugins.description: Detects injected code in user mode memory.

plugins.name: hollowfind
plugins.description: Detects evidence of process hollowing.

plugins.name: yarascan
plugins.description: Scans process or kernel memory with Yara signatures.

plugins.name: ldrmodules
plugins.description: Detects unlinked DLLs.

plugins.name: apihooks
plugins.description: Detects API hooks in process and kernel memory.

plugins.name: driverirp
plugins.description: Detects I/O Request Packet (IRP) function hooks in drivers.

plugins.name: impscan
plugins.description: Scans for imports in process or kernel memory.

plugins.name: svcscan
plugins.description: Scans for Windows services.

plugins.name: memdump
plugins.description: Dumps the addressable memory for a process.

plugins.name: vaddump
plugins.description: Dumps the Virtually Allocated memory for a process.

plugins.name: moddump
plugins.description: Dumps a kernel driver to an executable file sample.

plugins.name: dlldump
plugins.description: Dumps DLLs from a process address space.

plugins.name: procdump
plugins.description: Dumps a process to an executable file sample.

plugins.name: vboxinfo
plugins.description: Dumps information about a VirtualBox VM.

plugins.name: timeliner
plugins.description: Creates a timeline from various artifacts in memory.

plugins.name: mftparser
plugins.description: Parses MFT entries and adds them to the timeline.

plugins.name: shellbags
plugins.description: Parses Shellbags entries and adds them to the timeline.

plugins.name: shimcache
plugins.description: Parses Shimcache entries and adds them to the timeline.

plugins.name: userassist
plugins.description: Parses UserAssist entries and adds them to the timeline.
